statements: SELECT * FROM encrypted_payment_info
SELECT payment_id, card_holder_name FROM encrypted_payment_info ORDER BY payment_id ASC
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM encrypted_payment_info WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM encrypted_payment_info WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31'
SELECT payment_id, card_holder_name, cvv FROM encrypted_payment_info ORDER BY card_holder_name DESC
SELECT * FROM encrypted_payment_info WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT payment_id, card_holder_name, card_number FROM encrypted_payment_info WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT card_number, cvv FROM encrypted_payment_info WHERE payment_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_payment_info WHERE card_holder_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT payment_id, card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM encrypted_payment_info WHERE cvv = '123';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM encrypted_payments WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM encrypted_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_details FROM encrypted_payments WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM encrypted_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(payment_amount), COUNT(payment_id) FROM encrypted_payments WHERE customer_id = 123 GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM encrypted_payments WHERE payment_amount = (SELECT MAX(payment_amount) FROM encrypted_payments);
SELECT ep.payment_id, ek.encryption_key FROM encrypted_payments ep JOIN encryption_keys ek ON ep.customer_id = ek.key_id WHERE payment_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM encrypted_payments;
SELECT id, card_holder_name, expiry_date FROM encrypted_payments WHERE card_number LIKE '4111%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_date, amount, status FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number IN ('1234567890', '9876543210');
SELECT * FROM encrypted_payments WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT card_number, expiry_date FROM encrypted_payments WHERE id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_payments WHERE card_number LIKE '1234%';
SELECT * FROM payment_information;
SELECT payment_id, card_holder_name FROM payment_information ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT payment_id, transaction_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT log_id, log_description, log_date FROM payment_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_information;
SELECT payment_id, card_holder_name FROM payment_information WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'success' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, log_description FROM payment_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT audit_log_id, user_id, action_taken, action_date FROM payment_audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1234 ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, encrypted_card_number FROM payment_users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, timestamp FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_method_type, encrypted_method_details FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM payment_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_users ORDER BY username DESC, user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, encrypted_card_expiry FROM payment_users WHERE encrypted_card_expiry IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(username) > 5;
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_amount, t.timestamp FROM payment_users u JOIN payment_transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT m.payment_method_type, m.encrypted_method_details, u.username FROM payment_methods m JOIN payment_users u ON m.user_id = u.user_id WHERE m.payment_method_type = 'Credit Card' AND LENGTH(u.username) < 10 ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT l.log_timestamp, l.log_message, u.username FROM payment_logs l JOIN payment_users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE l.log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY l.log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
